changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE APP_USER ( ID INT8 NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, EMAIL VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, ROLE VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, ACTIVE BOOLEAN NOT NULL, SME_ID INT8, CREATED_BY INT8, LAST_MODIFIED_BY INT8, CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP(6), DELETED_AT TIMESTAMP(6), DELETED_BY INT8, LAST_MODIFIED_AT TIMESTAMP(6), CONSTRAINT APP_USER_PKEY PRIMARY KEY (ID), CONSTRAINT APP_USER_EMAIL_UKEY UNIQUE (EMAIL), CONSTRAINT APP_USER_SME_FKEY FOREIGN KEY (SME_ID) REFERENCES SME (ID) );
